meanings.definition: A person who is starting to learn a skill or take part in an activity.
meanings.sent1: The beginner asked many questions during the class.
meanings.sent2: She is a beginner in playing the piano.
meanings.sent3: The beginner tried to juggle oranges and ended up dropping them all.
meanings.sent4: Being a beginner is like being a seed just planted in the ground, waiting to grow.
meanings.sent5: The beginner's excitement to learn was contagious to everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: A person who is new to a particular activity or field.
meanings.sent1: The beginner was eager to explore the world of photography.
meanings.sent2: He felt like a beginner when he started his new job.
meanings.sent3: The beginner chef accidentally mistook sugar for salt in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean of knowledge, the beginner is just dipping their toes.
meanings.sent5: The beginner's enthusiasm was refreshing to the seasoned professionals around them.
